text: Sara Watkins (born June 8, 1981) is an American violinist. She is most famous as a member of Californian bluegrass band Nickel Creek. ==Discography== Title Details Peak chart positions US US Folk US Heat Sara Watkins * Release date: April 7, 2009 * Label: Nonesuch Records — — 13 Sun Midnight Sun * Release date: May 8, 2012 * Label: Nonesuch Records — 11 16 Young in All the Wrong Ways * Release date: July 1, 2016 * Label: New West Records 200 7 1 Under the Pepper Tree * Release date: March 26, 2021 * Label: New West Records "—" denotes releases that did not chart ==References== Category:American violinists Category:Singer-songwriters from California Category:1981 births Category:Living people
title: Sara Watkins
